p: In vitro, annonacin extracted from the root of A. muricata promoted death of dopaminergic neurons in embryonic rat mesencephalic cultured cells and caused tau protein pathology in cultured rat striatal neurons (Lannuzel et al., 2003, 2006). A high degree of toxicity on Lund human mesencephalic cells was observed after exposure to preparations from marketed dietary supplements containing leaves and stems of A. muricata (Höllerhage et al., 2015).
